statements: DELETE FROM ProcurementReports WHERE department_id = 2 AND report_date >= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM procurement_spending WHERE amount_spent > 10000 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CostSavings WHERE saving_amount > 1000 AND description LIKE '%vendor%';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York' AND phone_number = '123-456-7890';
DELETE FROM vendors WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM vendors WHERE name = 'ABC Corp' AND location = 'New York';
